details:
It was discovered that there was a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability
in python-bleach, a whitelist-based HTML sanitisation library.


* [CVE-2021-23980](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-23980)
mutation XSS via allowed math or svg; p or br; and style, title,
 noscript, script, textarea, noframes, iframe, or xmp tags with
 strip\_comments=False


For Debian 9 Stretch, these problems have been fixed in version
2.0-1+deb9u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your python-bleach packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
